commit message:
Fix NPE in IssueListActivity when not authorized

The `mCreateFab` member is only set when authorized.

Fixes #319.

Merge pull request #320 from avdv/fix-NPE-319

Fix NPE in IssueListActivity when not authorized
Fix a number of reported crashes.

Open binary and very large (> 1 MB) files in external app.

If a matching app is found directly that app is used, otherwise the file
will be opened in the browser.

Closes #322

Properly disambiguate ref and path when opening a tree/commit URL.

Closes #316.
